name: Super Torture World 3D
description:
Super Torture World 3D is an Adventure game made for the 2014 Horror Jam at Full Sail Univeristy. 

The game was developed over the course of 10 days by a team of 4 people. 

It was inspired by the mini game "Captain Toad" from Super Mario World 3D.

Download link is located at the bottom of the page!

*Donations are not required.*

To not donate, click the link that says:

"No thanks, just take me to the downloads" 

when the donation dialogue appears. Thanks!

Ryan Thompson - Programming / Design / Music
